snippet: Senator Carl Levin told Republicans that they were out of bounds for demanding additional financial information from Chuck Hagel, the nominee for defense secretary.
abstract: Sen Carl Levin, chairman of Senate Armed Services Committee, tells committee’s top Republican, Sen James M Inhofe, that he and other Senate Republicans are out of bounds for demanding additional financial information from Chuck Hagel, Pres Obama’s choice for defense secretary.
lead_paragraph: Senator Carl Levin told Republicans that they were out of bounds for demanding additional financial information from Chuck Hagel, the nominee for defense secretary.

headline.seo: Panel Chairman Criticizes G.O.P. Request on Hagel Financial Data
headline.main: Panel Chairman Criticizes G.O.P. Request on Hagel’s Financial Data
headline.print_headline: Panel Chairman Criticizes G.O.P. Request on Hagel’s Financial Data
